name: Pod Hoop Earrings
description:
The pod hoop earrings are a cousin to the pod dangles.  These unconventional hoop/dangle hybrids are easy to wear and compliment any look. 

The pod hoop earrings are made of patinated copper with sterling silver ear wires. 

Dimensions: 2.5 in (L) x 3/8 in (W) x 3/8 in (D)

Each piece is hand colored using a heat patina so please allow for variations in the color of the copper. You'll find a unique combination of deep cherry reds, fiery oranges and golden yellows in each pair.

All of the jewelry you see here is hand wrought. Please allow for some slight variation from the photographs.

name: Sprouting Pod Dangle Earrings
description:
The sprouting pod dangle earrings (in copper and silver) are light as a feather while making a bold statement. They are perfect for any occasion and can be worn with a casual look or dressed up for a night on the town. 

The sprouting pod dangle earrings are made of patinated copper with sterling silver sprouting from within the pods and sterling silver ear wires. 

Dimensions: 2.25 in (L) x 3/8 in (W) x 3/8 in (D)

Each piece is hand colored using a fire patina so please allow for variations in the color of the copper. You'll find a unique combination of deep cherry reds, fiery oranges and golden yellows in each pair.

All of the jewelry you see here is hand wrought. Please allow for some slight variation from the photographs.

name: Goldstone Statement Ring
description:
This ring is fun and funky with a bit of sparkle. Wearing this marquise cabochon Goldstone set in a custom sterling silver bezel you'll make a bold statement. The silver has a dark finish which will wear beautifully over time and create a unique antique look. 

Dimensions: 1-1/4 in x 3/4 in 
Size: 6.5
Width of band: 3/8 in

Caring for Your Ring
If your ring becomes dirty, use a dab of dish soap on a soft toothbrush and gently clean it in warm water, then dry with a soft cloth. Using an abrasive or chemical jewelry cleaner will damage the stone and the patina.

name: Pod Dangle Earrings
description:
The pod dangle earrings are light as a feather while making a bold statement. They are perfect for any occasion and can be worn with a casual look or dressed up for a night on the town. 

The pod dangle earrings are made of either patinated copper or fine silver with sterling silver ear wires. 

Dimensions: 2.5 in (L) x 3/8 in (W) x 3/8 in (D)

The copper earrings are hand colored using a fire patina so please allow for variations in the color of the copper. You'll find a unique combination of deep cherry reds, fiery oranges and golden yellows in each pair.

All of the jewelry you see here is hand wrought. Please allow for some slight variation from the photographs.
